Title: A Night Owl
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Timothy J. Sexton, Cole Maliska (executive story editor), Mo Masi (story editor), Ryan Maldonado (story editor), Eduardo Javier Canto (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Rachel DiPillo
Plot: A college professor is caught smuggling heroin to Canada.
